name: You Die - In the Temple of RNG Version 1.0
name_original: You Die - In the Temple of RNG Version 1.0
description:
Made in 48 hours (some Ui Elements excludet) at the GMTK GameJam!

You can decide your own fate (Abilities) with the help of the mighty dice. 

It is a plattformer with exploring and adventure mixed in. The spooky and mysterious vibe makes it feel a bit scary but not too scary. Your Drone Companion is a usefull tool when in th dark. I hope you have fun with this ~15 min Adventure!

I challenge you to play with night mode and use your drone.

Press H ingame for the Help Menu!

Everything made by me, except:

Audio: Mixkit

Player 3D Model: Unreal

Tree: UE Marketstore (Stylizied Weadows)

If the Dice/Die gets broken in the beginning, restart the whole game.

Tools: Photoshop, Substance Painter, Blender, Unreal Engine 5
